answerText: Orange River[10] An 1899 conference held in this judicial capital of South Africa failed to prevent the Second Boer War.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | Editors 3 | 5 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Answer the following about the geography of South Africa. For 10 points each: [10] This longest river in South Africa flows south from the Drakensberg Mountains to Alexander Bay in the Atlantic Ocean. It is named for a royal house from the Netherlands.
